tool_description: Analyzes historical shipping performance and real-time factors to provide refined delivery time estimates with confidence intervals.

historical_days.description: Number of historical days to analyze (30-365)

seasonal_adjustment.description: Whether to apply seasonal performance adjustments

error_messages: Invalid carrier service format: Use 'Carrier:Service' format (e.g., 'FedEx:Ground')
Invalid historical period: historical_days must be between 30 and 365
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data for reliable analysis
Unsupported carrier service: Carrier service combination not supported for analysis
usage: Provide carrier_service and route in specified formats. Optionally set historical_days for analysis period and seasonal_adjustment flag. Returns refined delivery estimates.

average_transit_days.description: Average transit time in days based on historical data

confidence_interval.description: Confidence interval for delivery estimate (e.g., '2-4 days')

delay_factors.description: Identified factors that commonly cause delays on this route
